function.description: Returns the trimmed version of the string. If the optional boolean parameter internal is set to true, the routine will also replace slack white space inside the string with a single space.

examples.example: String.trim(" Xillio Xillio Xillio Xillio Xillio "); String.trim(" Xillio Xillio Xillio Xillio Xillio ", true);
"Xillio Xillio Xillio Xillio Xillio" "Xillio Xillio Xillio Xillio Xillio"
